head.title: About Me
head.text-1: In this section you'll learn a bit about me, my skills and some of my story
head.strong-1: in case you want to know it!
head.text-2: I combine design and code to

aboutMe.description: I'm a SWE from Icesi University with a strong passion for cybersecurity and a particular focus on ethical hacking. With experience as an AppSec Engineer and Security Analyst, I've tackled diverse challenges from identifying vulnerabilities and conducting penetration tests to performing secure code reviews. I'm proficient with tools like Metasploit, Burp Suite, and Caido. Currently preparing for the OSCP and CBBH certifications.

education.subtitle: Academic background and professional growth.
education.li-1: B.Sc. in Software Engineering from Icesi University
education.li-2: Professional Certificate in Ethical Hacking (Red, Blue & Purple Team) - UdeCatalunya

certifications.subtitle: Professional certifications in cybersecurity and ethical hacking
